sentence.Network_en: The children were all agog to hear the story.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们都渴望着要听这个故事.

sentence.Network_en: The children were all agog to see their presents.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子都兴奋地急着要看给他们的礼物.

sentence.Network_en: The city was agog with rumours last night that the two had been executed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那两人已被处决的传言昨晚搞得全城沸沸扬扬。

list.abs: just left give ten meters , see only small happy trot all the way by far and come the pose is attractive very the edge runs to wave toward us the side of allthe face agog expression .刚开出十几米，只见小怡一路小跑由远而来，姿势甚是迷人，边跑边朝我们挥手，满脸急切的表情。
The voters were all agog to see their new president ., 选民们急不可耐 , 要看他们的新总统.

agog是什么意思|agog的中文意思|Show秀网... ... All agog ： 激励地 agog fan ： 发热友 agog a ： 渴望的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French en gogues, from en 'in' + the plural of gogue 'fun'

entry.tran: 渴望的；急切的；热切期待的
entry.def: If you are agog, you are excited about something, and eager to know more about it.

example.ex: The city was agog with rumours last night that the two had been executed.
example.tran: 那两人已被处决的传言昨晚搞得全城沸沸扬扬。
